Description: Large first floor 3.5 bed/1 bath apartment in a multi-family house close to Inman Square. This lovely unit features hardwood floors, gas heating, lots of windows and sunlight, high ceilings, dishwasher and gas range. Spacious bedrooms with closets, living room, eat-in-kitchen, front/back deck. Coin-op laundry in the basement. Tandem parking available. Small pets are negotiable for a pet fee. 9-1 Measurements: Livingroom: 11x13 Kitchen: 9.5x11.5 Bathroom: 6x8.5 Office: 8x10.5 Bed 1: 10.5x11 Bed 2: 11x11 Bed 3: 11x11 NO SHOWINGS UNTIL WEEK OF 5-28 First Sec.
